flawed_nl_solution:
He can buy 21 artichokes because 15 / 1.25 = <<15/1.25=21>>21
Each artichoke makes 1.67 ounces of dip because there are 3 artichokes per 5 ounces
He can make 35 ounces of dip because 21 x (5/3) = 105/3 = <<21*(5/3)=35>>35
#### 35

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
